head.description: A community of students who are passionate about technology and innovation.

intro.title: Why IDeA?
intro.subtitle: Why should you contact us?
intro.description: We are a team of student who learned how to code and we want to help you to create your project.

subtitle.1: Thanks to our different experiences, we have acquired a lot of skills in different fields.

description.1a: Analyze your data and extract the information you need.
description.1b: Create a machine learning model to predict your data.
description.1c: Create a dashboard to visualize your data.
description.2b: Manage your project from start to finish.
description.2c: Create a website for your project.

description.1: We have already worked on some projects, here are some of them.
description.2: Creation of a visualization tool for cinema data and its competitors, ensuring regular and automated updates
description.3: Predict the number of visitors of the park by day or night.
description.4: Process and analyze data related to games and subscriptions using dashboards, and implement a customer typology

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: If you still have any questions, please have a look

question.1: Are our services free of charge?

answer.1: Yes, our services are completely free of charge!

footer.description: IDeA is a non-profit organization that promotes the development of various projects in the field of education, culture, art and science.
